content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)).

### Water supply system at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) and pipe group (position (107.5, -34.5)).

### Steam supply system at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), and pipe group (position (117.5, -34.5)).

### Belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts (positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)).


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert coal into the boiler
- Make sure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the boiler.
- Check if the boiler is out of fuel before trying to insert coal.

### Errors when the boiler is out of fuel
- Make sure to add coal to the boiler regularly to keep it working.
- Monitor the boiler's fuel level to avoid it running out of fuel.

### Errors when the steam engine is not connected to a fluid system
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a pipe group that supplies steam.
- Check if the pipe group is working and has a sufficient amount of steam.


# NAMESPACE
* `insert_item`: a function to insert items into entities, with parameters `item`, `entity`, and `quantity`.
* `Prototype.Coal`: a constant representing coal.
* `boiler`: a variable representing the boiler entity.
* `inventory`: a dictionary representing the agent's inventory, with keys being item names and values being quantities.
* `entities`: a list of entities on the map, including furnaces, offshore pumps, boilers, steam engines, and belts.
